text.paragraph: instructions: resource and instructions provided during visit patient may continue to experience low grade fever and chills Return to clinic or call 911 if you experience chest pain, shortness of breah, high fevers, or intractable vomiting/diarrhea Recommended Patient Decision Aids: Vendor suppliedMEDICATIONS: Proventil (albuterol) inhalation aerosol 90 mcg/inh 2 puffs once (start date: 08/06/2012) prescription: of 90 mcg/inh 2 puffs once (NO refills)

text.paragraph: 2012-08-06 : Mild Fever, 2 days Chills, 2 days Cough productive of greenish sputum, 2 days
